Package me.julb.applications.authorizationserver.controllers

Class UserAuthenticationByPasswordResetController

java.lang.Object
me.julb.applications.authorizationserver.controllers.UserAuthenticationByPasswordResetController
@RestController @Validated @RequestMapping(produces="application/json") public class UserAuthenticationByPasswordResetController extends Object
The rest controller to reset the password of a user.

  • Method Details

    • triggerPasswordReset

      @PostMapping(path="/users/authentications/type/password/trigger-reset", consumes="application/x-www-form-urlencoded") @ResponseStatus(NO_CONTENT) @PreAuthorize("permitAll()") public void triggerPasswordReset(@RequestParam("mail") @NotNull @NotBlank @Email @NotNull @NotBlank @Email String mail, @RequestParam("recoveryChannelDeviceType") @NotNull @NotNull RecoveryChannelType recoveryChannelDeviceType, @RequestParam("recoveryChannelDeviceId") @NotNull @NotBlank @Identifier @NotNull @NotBlank @Identifier String recoveryChannelDeviceId)
      Trigger the reset process of a authentication by password.
      Parameters:
      mail - the user mail.
      recoveryChannelDeviceType - the recovery channel type.
      recoveryChannelDeviceId - the recovery channel device identifier.

    • resetPassword

      @PostMapping(path="/users/authentications/type/password/reset-password", consumes="application/x-www-form-urlencoded") @ResponseStatus(NO_CONTENT) @PreAuthorize("permitAll()") public void resetPassword(@RequestParam("mail") @NotNull @NotBlank @Email @NotNull @NotBlank @Email String mail, @RequestParam("newPassword") @NotNull @NotBlank @SecurePassword @NotNull @NotBlank @SecurePassword String newPassword, @RequestParam("resetToken") @NotNull @NotBlank @NotNull @NotBlank String resetToken)
      Updates the password using reset token.
      Parameters:
      mail - the mail.
      newPassword - the new password.
      resetToken - the reseet token.
